introMessage: Hi! I’m a tiny FAQ helper. Ask me about maya nut, Brosimum alicastrum, or this website.

answers: maya nut is the roasted seed of the tropical tree Brosimum alicastrum. It can be used to make a rich, naturally caffeine-free drink or a versatile flour.
When you ask “What is MayaNut?”, it’s the seed of Brosimum alicastrum – a tropical tree whose seeds can be roasted, ground, and turned into drinks and foods.
The MayaNut Company is focusing on warm parts of Florida, especially South Florida below about 27°N, where Brosimum alicastrum can handle winters more easily.
Our early trials are in subtropical South Florida. Over time we hope to learn exactly how far north the maya nut tree can be grown in Florida.
The online store isn’t open yet. On the main page, the Store section shows placeholder MayaNut products while our plantation grows.
MayaNut beverages are still in development. For now you can scroll through the Store preview on the home page to see what we’re planning.
